recipe.title: Sauteed Carrots and Red Bell Peppers
ingredients: 2 medium carrots, cut diagonally into 1/4-inch-thick slices
1 red bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces
instructions: In a non-stick skillet heat butter and oil over moderate heat until foam subsides and cook carrots and bell peppers, stirring, 10 minutes, or until carrots are just tender. Season vegetables with salt and pepper.
